nodes.text: Horn Ambigene was a male individual from the Tydane system who led an anti-Galactic Republic militia for decades before becoming a general in the Confederacy of Independent Systems' Droid Army. During the Clone Wars between the Republic and Confederacy, Ambigene was stationed on the Bryx sector planet Pzandias as Commander of Organic Training, where his purpose was to teach fellow members of the Confederacy how to best keep their homeworlds free from the Republic.

Horn Ambigene was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars Roleplaying products. He was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in The Essential Guide to Warfare, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart, and published by Del Rey in 2012.
